snippet: The Knicks return to Miami, improbably, with their playoff hopes narrowly alive and Amar’e Stoudemire thriving again.
abstract: New York Knicks are preparing for Game 5 of their first-round NBA playoff series with the Miami Heat; hope to stave off elimination with Miami leading 3 games to 1. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: GREENBURGH, N.Y. -- Their faith restored, their lineup (mostly) intact, the Knicks boarded a flight bound for South Florida on Tuesday, to face down LeBron James and confront a haunting montage of memories: Iman Shumpert's buckling knee.

headline.main: Knicks, Trailing by 3-1, Focus on What Is, Not What Might Have Been
